DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the effectiveness of diet management with a losartan based titration regimen versus losartan based titration regimen alone on blood pressure reduction in hypertensive patients.
DOC.brief_title: SAALT: Subtracting Salt and Adding Losartan Trial (0954A-335)
